`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:`As a parent who has some time to spend with children, I want to create a playgroup session depending

`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h2,{children:"USER STORY 2 : List Playgroups"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:`As a PlayTime app user, I want to see the playgroup sessions with vacancy, so that I can make bookings for my
daughter and I don\u2019t need to take a day off from work`}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h2,{children:"USER STORY 3 : Join a Playgroup"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:`As a working parent using PlayTime app, I want my children to join a playgroup session created by other

supervision`}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h2,{children:"USER STORY 4 : Cancel/Reschedule a Playgroup"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:`As a parent who has created a playgroup session on Playtime app, I can only reschedule or cancel the playgroup
session more than 4 hours before the start of the session, so that the other parents can organise their days
accordingly`}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h2,{children:"USER STORY 5 : Send notification to user when a new playgroup is created"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:`As a working parent, I want to know the playgroup vacancies as soon they are created so that I can book my kid\u2019s

`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:`In terms of practicality and a better error prevention, users should be given enough flexibility to make a change
and contact each other, for MVP only telephone numbers of users are provided, in following sprints on-product

`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.li,{children:["The most important feature is selected as ",(0,e.jsx)(n.strong,{children:"USER STORY 1 - CREATE A PLAYGROUP SESSION"}),` due to the fact that
nobody can join a session without knowing who has some availability to spend with children. To understand how
interested people are in this application, without any further investment the MVP version can even just start with
just providing the organiser's telephone number and letting them call each other and arrange booking outside the
app.`]}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.li,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(n.strong,{children:"USER STORY 2 - LIST PLAYGROUP"})," is one of the important features letting the users to discover and find playgroups"]}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.li,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(n.strong,{children:"USER STORY 4 - CANCEL/RESCHEDULE PLAYGROUP"}),` is especially for error prevention letting the playgroup organiser
to take action when something urgent happens and let the other parents change their plans`]}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.li,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(n.strong,{children:"USER STORY 3 - JOIN A PLAYGROUP"}),` connecting the parents without needing to make a phone call and let them
arrange their time with a single click. This comes after USER STORY 2 in list, because this requires first to find the
available playgroup that matches with a parent time schedule and then joining a session. This can be broaden with
a Request to join-Approve/Reject feature in the next releases`]}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.li,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(n.strong,{children:"USER STORY 5 - NOTIFY USERS WHEN A NEW PLAYGROUP IS CREATED"}),` aims better retention rate, informing
users of new playgroup sessions and let them come back to product more often`]}),`
`]}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h1,{children:"Prioritised User Stories"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(r.STable,{header:["Priority","Prioritised User Stories"],rows:[{columns:["1",(0,e.jsxs)(e.Fragment,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(n.b,{children:"USER STORY 1"})," - Create a Playgroup As a parent who has some time to spend with children, I want to create a playgroup session depending on my availability, so that my kids can play with other kids at our house and socialise during school holidays"]})]},{columns:["2",(0,e.jsxs)(e.Fragment,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(n.b,{children:"User Story 2 - List Playgroups"})," As a PlayTime app user, I want to see the playgroup sessions with vacancy, so that I can make bookings for my daughter and I don\u2019t need to take a day off from work"]})]},{columns:["3",(0,e.jsxs)(e.Fragment,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(n.b,{children:"User Story 4 - Cancel/Reschedule a Playgroup"})," As a parent who has created a playgroup session on Playtime app, I can only reschedule or cancel the playgroup session more than 4 hours before the start of the session, so that the other parents can organise their days accordingly"]})]},{columns:["4",(0,e.jsxs)(e.Fragment,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(n.b,{children:"User Story 3 - Join a Playgroup"})," As a working parent using PlayTime app, I want my children to join a playgroup session created by other parents, so that I can leave my kids to people I know and let my children have good time under their supervision"]})]},{columns:["4",(0,e.jsxs)(e.Fragment,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(n.b,{children:"User Story 5 - Send notification to user"})," when a new playgroup is created As a working parent, I want to know the playgroup vacancies as soon they are created so that I can book my kid\u2019s place in the playgroup before anyone else"]})]}]}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h1,{children:"Feature Prioritisation Matrix"}),`
